page.title: 11PHILPOTS MANOR SCHOOL
page.content: This is a{Rudolf Steiner Home School for{emotionally disturbed}children of 6-19 years of age and an IQ of 75-95. The aim is to develop their human qualities and to lead a normal life as far as possible. The children often have no parents, are slightly retarded and suffering mental disorders, but have the ability to function in a classroom situation. A class teacher has a child for the first eight years trying to bring its nature into harmony by the co-ordinating of head, heart and hands in all subjects. Religion, arts and crafts, music, drama, games etc. are all important. A small farm with a variety of animals and horses for riding provides work experience. A centre for 16-19 year olds provides further education and training before they take their place in society.
